name: Welcome Back (Nessa Cannon)
description:
Welcome Back is a short, cathartic interactive fiction story about a train station that only services liminal spaces, and your journey to find someone important to tell them something important.

It takes about fifteen minutes to play, and I'd recommend setting it to fullscreen!

Thank you Devin Yang (@devinScribbles) for the lovely cover art, Grim Baccaris (@grimoirtua) for Twine help, and Anna Webster and Kit Conklin for moral support and reminding me that humans need to eat and sleep.

You can find the rest of my itch.io projects here, my website and contact info here, and my Twitter account here. Thanks so much for playing!
